rev.desc.rev.desc: AGMRQ10H17568, update start panel, add:
$L.primary.filename=jscall("Workflow.getWorkflowTableName", $L.primary.filename)
add the following to move.fields
title in $L.related=1 in description in $L.primary
Add new panel to eval link post expressions.
qbe.post.link.exp:process
$L.link.post.expr=denull(1 in post.expressions in $L.link)
for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.link.post.expr) do ($L.junk=evaluate($L.i in $L.link.post.expr))
if (not null(1 in javascript.post in $L.link)) then js(1 in javascript.post in $L.link)
Hua: add a flag so that when save edited screlation record, do save ratrher than add
added support for promt reason when relating/unrelating records.
CP SCR36414
changed exit on the qbe.call.open.application panel from normal.exit to 'eval.post.open.expressions'. This is a new panel that simply evaluates any post expressions defined in the screlconfig record.
adjusted the SCR listed for the change below: it was incorrect
CP SCR32986
added parameter $RETURN.ACTION and then used it to return the value of $L.action on the normal.exit panel
Added expressions to process javascript in the link expressions.
Modified previous fix to take the original exit (to the list) if the back button causes the save.
Loop back to displaying the screlation record after saving. Instead of going back to the list.
Use not same() instead of ~= on panel edit.rel.1
Changed the no related record message level from 3 to 1.
misspelled word on add.relation.prep should have been $L.relation and not $L.releation
No longer converts $L.unique to a number field for cm3r and cm3t records.
Modified for new Incident use of probsummary and problem.
Inserted a routine between qbe.pre.open.expressions and qbe.call.open.application to handle the pre open process in the screlconfig record.
Added "cm3t" to the list of files with numerical identifiers for the new "isin" functionality.
Added support to change the query being issued for related records to use the "isin" functionality instead of constructing a long "or" query.
Moved count routine to the RAD.
Changed qbe.select.link no records and normal exits from qbe.no.link to qbe.pre.open.expressions so that an error message won't appear when opening a related problem.
Added if ($UNIQUE=$L.unique) then ($L.unique=source in $L.relation) to panel qbe.save.queries to allow for the proper select of the screlate reocrd when viewing related record.
Fixed editing of screlation records. Save wasn't working correctly due to a mistyped variable.
Changed exit on qbe.no.related to go to normal.exit instead of qbe.display if no records selected.
scmsg
Query all related record regardless of source or depend. Now all records will be displayed on one list, instead of using the cause/create button to switch between lists.
Setup $parent.pointer prior to viewing a record.
Removed evaluations
screlate no longer saves the relation. It is up to the application to save the relation.
put in changes for using qbe list

descript.descript: AGMRQ10H17568, update start panel, add:
$L.primary.filename=jscall("Workflow.getWorkflowTableName", $L.primary.filename)
add the following to move.fields
title in $L.related=1 in description in $L.primary
Add new panel to eval link post expressions.
qbe.post.link.exp:process
$L.link.post.expr=denull(1 in post.expressions in $L.link)
for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.link.post.expr) do ($L.junk=evaluate($L.i in $L.link.post.expr))
if (not null(1 in javascript.post in $L.link)) then js(1 in javascript.post in $L.link)
Hua: add a flag so that when save edited screlation record, do save ratrher than add
added support for promt reason when relating/unrelating records.
CP SCR36414
changed exit on the qbe.call.open.application panel from normal.exit to 'eval.post.open.expressions'. This is a new panel that simply evaluates any post expressions defined in the screlconfig record.
adjusted the SCR listed for the change below: it was incorrect
CP SCR23369
added parameter $RETURN.ACTION and then used it to return the value of $L.action on the normal.exit panel
Added expressions to process javascript in the link expressions.
Modified previous fix to take the original exit (to the list) if the back button causes the save.
Loop back to displaying the screlation record after saving. Instead of going back to the list.
Use not same() instead of ~= on panel edit.rel.1
Changed the no related record message level from 3 to 1.
misspelled word on add.relation.prep should have been $L.relation and not $L.releation
No longer converts $L.unique to a number field for cm3r and cm3t records.
Modified for new Incident use of probsummary and problem.
Inserted a routine between qbe.pre.open.expressions and qbe.call.open.application to handle the pre open process in the screlconfig record.
Added "cm3t" to the list of files with numerical identifiers for the new "isin" functionality.
Added support to change the query being issued for related records to use the "isin" functionality instead of constructing a long "or" query.
Moved count routine to the RAD.
Changed qbe.select.link no records and normal exits from qbe.no.link to qbe.pre.open.expressions so that an error message won't appear when opening a related problem.
Added if ($UNIQUE=$L.unique) then ($L.unique=source in $L.relation) to panel qbe.save.queries to allow for the proper select of the screlate reocrd when viewing related record.
Fixed editing of screlation records. Save wasn't working correctly due to a mistyped variable.
Changed exit on qbe.no.related to go to normal.exit instead of qbe.display if no records selected.
scmsg
Query all related record regardless of source or depend. Now all records will be displayed on one list, instead of using the cause/create button to switch between lists.
Setup $parent.pointer prior to viewing a record.
Removed evaluations
screlate no longer saves the relation. It is up to the application to save the relation.
put in changes for using qbe list
